    • Class project.notizprogrammrepository.model.Application

      class Application extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • calendarSegment
          CalendarSegment calendarSegment
          The segment containing and managing all calendarEntries.
        • currentMode
          Mode currentMode
          A enum representing which mode is currently active. default = CALENDAR
        • noteSegment
          NoteSegment noteSegment
          The segment containing and managing all notes and notecollections.
        • todoSegment
          TodoSegment todoSegment
          The segment containing and managing all todoEntries.

  • Package project.notizprogrammrepository.model.Types

    • Class project.notizprogrammrepository.model.Types.NoteCollection

      class NoteCollection extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • notes
          TreeMap<Date,Note> notes
          A TreeMap containing all notes of the collection sorted by their date. TreeMap is used to ensure fast editing.
        • subject
          Subject subject
          The subject of the collection.
        • title
          String title
          The title of the collection.

  • Package project.notizprogrammrepository.model.Types.Dates

    • Class project.notizprogrammrepository.model.Types.Dates.Calendar

      class Calendar extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • currentMonthIndex
          int currentMonthIndex
          The index of the currently displayed month pointing to where in the LinkedList "months" it is saved.
        • months
          LinkedList<Month> months
          A list of months. The first element of this list is either one month earlier than the currently active month or the first month, where an Entry was made. The last element of this list is either two months into the future from the currently active month or the month that is the furthest in the future, where an Entry was made.

    • Class project.notizprogrammrepository.model.Types.Dates.DateComparator

      class DateComparator extends Object implements Serializable

    • Class project.notizprogrammrepository.model.Types.Dates.Day

      class Day extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • date
          Date date
          The date with which the Object is created. The date contains the day the object represents.
        • entries
          ArrayList<Entry> entries
          An ArrayList containing all entries made on this day.

    • Class project.notizprogrammrepository.model.Types.Dates.Month

      class Month extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • days
          Day[][] days
          A 2-dimensional array of Day objects containing the Days of the month.
        • monthNumber
          int monthNumber
          An integer representing the number of the month from 1 to 12
        • year
          int year
          An integer representing the year.

    • Class project.notizprogrammrepository.model.Types.entries.Entry

      class Entry extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • date
          Date date
          The date where the Entry is stored for CalendarEntry and Note. The dueDate for TodoEntry.
        • text
          String text
          The text of the entry.
        • title
          String title
          The title of the Entry.

    • Class project.notizprogrammrepository.model.Types.entries.Note

      class Note extends Entry implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • collectByTitle
          boolean collectByTitle
          A property defining whether the note will be added to the NoteCollection of the same title.
        • subject
          Subject subject
          The school-subject for which the note was written

    • Class project.notizprogrammrepository.model.Types.entries.TodoEntry

      class TodoEntry extends Entry implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • id
          long id
          The id of the Entry used for comparison between 2 entries.
        • priority
          int priority
          The priority of the Entry ranging from 0 to ten where 0 is the top priority.

  • Package project.notizprogrammrepository.model.Types.segments

    • Class project.notizprogrammrepository.model.Types.segments.CalendarSegment

      class CalendarSegment extends Segment implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • calendar
          Calendar calendar
          The calendar corresponding to the segment.
        • currentWeek
          int currentWeek
          The week of the current month that is currently being displayed. default = 1.
        • weekViewActive
          boolean weekViewActive
          A property stating whether the whole month or just a week is currently displayed.

    • Class project.notizprogrammrepository.model.Types.segments.NoteSegment

      class NoteSegment extends CalendarSegment implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • collections
          TreeMap<String,NoteCollection> collections
          A TreeMap containing all NoteCollections sorted by title for faster access

    • Class project.notizprogrammrepository.model.Types.segments.TodoSegment

      class TodoSegment extends Segment implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • entries
          ArrayList<TodoEntry> entries
          A List of all entries in the todoList.
        • nextEmptyId
          int nextEmptyId
          An integer starting at the minimum value representing the id of the next TodoEntry that is created.
